summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Franklin Avenue, from Harvard Avenue North to a connection with the existing pavement on Fuhrman Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7926 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
